input.sentences: there was a huge fire on the building across from my house today
fire fighters were able to get everything under control before night set in | they did a great job .
the fire can from the attic and busted a huge hole in the roof .
overall the building was still mostly in good shape | the structure was n't harmed too much .
a blue tarp was thrown over the hole in the roof | and repair plans were already being talked about by the end of the next day .
output.sentences: There was a huge house fire down the street.
The fire was set before the firefighters did their job.
The roof had a huge hole at the top.
They thrown the tarp on top of the house and talked after.
